name: Father Nicholas the Wonderworker, Archbishop of Myra in Lycia
troparia: (Tone 4) The truth of your deeds made you for your flock a rule of faith* and an image of meekness,* a teacher of continence.* And so you gained the heights through humility,* riches through poverty,* father and bishop Nicholas.* Intercede with Christ our God** for the salvation of our souls.
kontakia: (Tone 3) In Myra, O holy one, you proved yourself a priest.* You fulfilled the Gospel of Christ, O venerable father.* You laid down your soul for your people* and saved the innocent from death.* And so you were sanctified as a great initiate of Godâ€™s grace.
